SELECT COUNT(BBS_NO)
FROM BOARD b, MEMBERS m where b.WRTR_ID = m.member_id and
b.WRTR_ID = #{clientId} and
WRT_YMD >= TO_DATE(#{boardFilterDto.dmndYmdStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') and
WRT_YMD <= TO_DATE(#{boardFilterDto.dmndYmdEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')and

m.FLNM LIKE '%'||#{boardFilterDto.wrtrNm}||'%' and
BBS_CN LIKE '%'||#{boardFilterDto.keyWord}||'%' and
BBS_TYPE = upper(#{type})

SELECT BBS_NO as bbsNo, BBS_TTL as bbsTtl, ANS_YN as ansYn, INQ_CNT as inqCnt, WRT_YMD as wrtYmd, m.FLNM as wrtNm FROM BOARD b, MEMBERS m where b.WRTR_ID = m.member_id
and b.WRTR_ID = #{clientId}
and BBS_TYPE = upper(#{type})
and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(WRT_YMD,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{boardFilterDto.dmndYmdStart},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(WRT_YMD,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{boardFilterDto.dmndYmdEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and ANS_YN = #{boardFilterDto.ansYn}
and m.FLNM LIKE '%'||#{boardFilterDto.wrtrNm}||'%'
and BBS_CN LIKE '%'||#{boardFilterDto.keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY WRT_YMD DESC OFFSET #{pager.startRowNo}-1 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
